# ReactJS Workshop

<a href="https://formidable.com"><img style="background-color:#000;width:300px" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"></a>

[Formidable](https://formidable.com/) will hold a full-day React training workshop on **Monday, November 4th** prior to the conference. The exact details are TBD, but it will be an intermediate/advanced workshop that will build on the concepts from [last year's workshop](https://2018.cascadiajs.com/react-training/).
